snippet: The blackout of a Turkish soap opera broadcast illegally in Iran through a satellite channel based in Dubai has sparked rumors over the cause — and the government’s involvement.
abstract: Tehran Journal; blackout of Turkish soap opera broadcast illegally in Iran through satellite channel GEM TV sparks rumors over cause; some fear it is indicative of government crackdown, while others believe it is plot to get people to subscribe online for monthly fee.
lead_paragraph: The blackout of a Turkish soap opera broadcast illegally in Iran through a satellite channel based in Dubai has sparked rumors over the cause — and the government’s involvement.

headline.seo: Soap Opera’s Disappearance Adds to TV Drama in Iran
headline.main: Starring in Drama in Iran: TV Itself
headline.print_headline: Starring In Drama In Iran: TV Itself
